metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000026 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Linux Linux kernel version at least v4.8 onwards, probably well beforecontains a Insufficient input validation vulnerability in bnx2x networkcard driver that can result in DoS: Network card firmware assertion takescard off-line. This attack appear to be exploitable via An attacker on amust pass a very large, specially crafted packet to the bnx2x card. Thiscan be done from an untrusted guest VM..

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000026` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:
